ne14:2.3: Ka ca pakatikathaya desana, cattari saccani.
ne14:2.5: “idam dukkhan”ti ayam pannatti pancannam khandhanam channam dhatunam attharasannam dhatunam dvadasannam ayatananam dasannam indriyanam nikkhepapannatti.
ne14:3.1: Kabalikare ce, bhikkhave, ahare atthi rago atthi nandi atthi tanha, patitthitam tattha vinnanam virulham.
ne14:3.2: Yattha patitthitam vinnanam virulham, atthi tattha namarupassa avakkanti.
ne14:3.3: Yattha atthi namarupassa avakkanti, atthi tattha sankharanam vuddhi.
ne14:3.4: Yattha atthi sankharanam vuddhi, atthi tattha ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti.
ne14:3.5: Yattha atthi ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti, atthi tattha ayatim jatijaramaranam.
ne14:3.6: Yattha atthi ayatim jatijaramaranam, sasokam tam, bhikkhave, sadaram saupayasanti vadami.
ne14:4.3: Vinnane ce, bhikkhave, ahare atthi rago atthi nandi atthi tanha, patitthitam tattha vinnanam virulham.
ne14:4.4: Yattha patitthitam vinnanam virulham, atthi tattha namarupassa avakkanti.
ne14:4.5: Yattha atthi namarupassa avakkanti, atthi tattha sankharanam vuddhi.
ne14:4.6: Yattha atthi sankharanam vuddhi, atthi tattha ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti.
ne14:4.7: Yattha atthi ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti, atthi tattha ayatim jatijaramaranam.
ne14:4.8: Yattha atthi ayatim jatijaramaranam, sasokam tam, bhikkhave, sadaram saupayasanti vadami.
ne14:4.9: Ayam pabhavapannatti dukkhassa ca samudayassa ca.

ne14:5.2: Yattha appatitthitam vinnanam avirulham, natthi tattha namarupassa avakkanti.
ne14:5.3: Yattha natthi namarupassa avakkanti, natthi tattha sankharanam vuddhi.
ne14:5.4: Yattha natthi sankharanam vuddhi, natthi tattha ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti.
ne14:5.5: Yattha natthi ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti, natthi tattha ayatim jatijaramaranam.
ne14:5.6: Yattha natthi ayatim jatijaramaranam, asokam tam, bhikkhave, adaram anupayasanti vadami.

ne14:6.4: Yattha appatitthitam vinnanam avirulham, natthi tattha namarupassa avakkanti.
ne14:6.5: Yattha natthi namarupassa avakkanti, natthi tattha sankharanam vuddhi.
ne14:6.6: Yattha natthi sankharanam vuddhi, natthi tattha ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti.
ne14:6.7: Yattha natthi ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti, natthi tattha ayatim jatijaramaranam.

ne14:7.1: Ayam parinnapannatti dukkhassa, pahanapannatti samudayassa, bhavanapannatti maggassa, sacchikiriyapannatti nirodhassa.
ne14:8.2: Appamatto nipako sato, samahito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathabhutam pajanati.
ne14:8.5: “Rupa anicca”ti yathabhutam pajanati “cakkhuvinnanam aniccan”ti yathabhutam pajanati.
ne14:8.7: Yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va, tampi aniccanti yathabhutam pajanati.
ne14:9.9: Yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va, tampi aniccanti yathabhutam pajanati.
ne14:10.1: Ayam bhavanapannatti maggassa, parinnapannatti dukkhassa, pahanapannatti samudayassa, sacchikiriyapannatti nirodhassa.
ne14:11.1: Rupam, radha, vikiratha vidhamatha viddhamsetha vikilaniyam karotha, pannaya tanhakkhayaya patipajjatha.
ne14:11.5: sankhare vinnanam vikiratha vidhamatha viddhamsetha vikilaniyam karotha, pannaya tanhakkhayaya patipajjatha.
ne14:12.1: Ayam nirodhapannatti nirodhassa, nibbidapannatti assadassa, parinnapannatti dukkhassa, pahanapannatti samudayassa, bhavanapannatti maggassa, sacchikiriyapannatti nirodhassa.
ne14:13.1: “So idam dukkhan”ti yathabhutam pajanati, “ayam dukkhasamudayo”ti yathabhutam pajanati, “ayam dukkhanirodho”ti yathabhutam pajanati “ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada”ti yathabhutam pajanati.
ne14:14.1: Ayam pativedhapannatti saccanam, nikkhepapannatti dassanabhumiya, bhavanapannatti maggassa, sacchikiriyapannatti sotapattiphalassa.
ne14:14.2: “So ime asava”ti yathabhutam pajanati, “ayam asavasamudayo”ti yathabhutam pajanati, “ayam asavanirodho”ti yathabhutam pajanati.
ne14:15.1: Ayam uppadapannatti khaye nanassa, okasapannatti anuppade nanassa, bhavanapannatti maggassa, parinnapannatti dukkhassa, pahanapannatti samudayassa, arambhapannatti viriyindriyassa, ahatanapannatti asatikanam, nikkhepapannatti bhavanabhumiya, abhinighatapannatti papakanam akusalanam dhammanam.
ne14:16.1: Idam “dukkhan”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
ne14:16.4: Ayam “dukkhanirodhagamini patipada”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
ne14:17.1: Ayam desanapannatti saccanam, nikkhepapannatti sutamayiya pannaya sacchikiriyapannatti anannatannassamitindriyassa, pavattanapannatti dhammacakkassa.
ne14:18.1: “Tam kho panidam dukkham parinneyyan”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
ne14:18.2: “So kho panayam dukkhasamudayo pahatabbo”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ne14:18.3: “so kho panayam dukkhanirodho sacchikatabbo”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ne14:18.4: “sa kho panayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada bhavetabba”ti me, bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
ne14:19.1: Ayam bhavanapannatti maggassa, nikkhepapannatti cintamayiya pannaya, sacchikiriyapannatti annindriyassa.
ne14:20.1: “Tam kho panidam dukkham parinnatan”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
ne14:20.2: “So kho panayam dukkhasamudayo pahino”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ne14:20.3: so kho panayam dukkhanirodho sacchikato”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ne14:20.4: “sa kho panayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada bhavita”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
ne14:21.1: Ayam bhavanapannatti maggassa, nikkhepapannatti bhavanamayiya pannaya, sacchikiriyapannatti annatavino indriyassa, pavattanapannatti dhammacakkassa.
ne14:23.8: “Abhindi kavacamivattasambhavan”ti abhinibbidapannatti cittassa, upadanapannatti sabbannutaya, padalanapannatti avijjandakosanam.
ne14:25.1: “Yo dukkhan”ti vevacanapannatti ca dukkhassa parinnapannatti ca.
ne14:25.4: “Kamesu so jantu katham nameyya”ti vevacanapannatti ca kamatanhaya abhinivesapannatti ca.
ne14:25.5: “Kama hi loke sangoti natva”ti paccatthikato dassanapannatti kamanam.
ne14:25.6: Kama hi angarakasupama mamsapesupama pavakakappa papatauragopama ca.
ne14:25.7: “Tesam satima”ti apacayapannatti pahanaya, nikkhepapannatti kayagataya satiya, bhavanapannatti maggassa.
ne14:25.10: Yada hi yogi kama sangoti pajanati.
ne14:25.11: So kamanam anuppadaya kusale dhamme uppadayati, so anuppannanam kusalanam dhammanam uppadaya vayamati.
ne14:25.14: Tattha so uppannanam kusalanam dhammanam thitiya vayamatiti ayam appamadapannatti bhavanaya, nikkhepapannatti viriyindriyassa, arakkhapannatti kusalanam dhammanam, thitipannatti adhicittasikkhaya.
ne14:27.3: “Upadhibandhano balo”ti pabhavapannatti papakanam icchavacaranam, kiccapannatti pariyutthananam.
ne14:27.7: “Assiri viya khayati”ti dassanapannatti dibbacakkhussa, nikkhepapannatti pannacakkhussa.
ne14:27.8: “Passato natthi kincanan”ti pativedhapannatti sattanam, rago kincanam doso kincanam moho kincanam.
ne14:28.1: “Atthi, bhikkhave, ajatam abhutam akatam asankhatam, no cetam, bhikkhave, abhavissa ajatam abhutam akatam asankhatam.
ne14:28.2: Nayidha jatassa bhutassa katassa sankhatassa nissaranam pannayetha.
ne14:28.3: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ajatam abhutam akatam asankhatam, tasma jatassa bhutassa katassa sankhatassa nissaranam pannayati”ti.
ne14:29.1: “No cetam, bhikkhave, abhavissa ajatam abhutam akatam asankhatan”ti desanapannatti nibbanassa vevacanapannatti ca.
ne14:29.2: “Nayidha jatassa bhutassa katassa sankhatassa nissaranam pannayetha”ti vevacanapannatti sankhatassa upanayanapannatti ca.
ne14:29.3: “Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ajatam abhutam akatam asankhatan”ti vevacanapannatti nibbanassa jotanapannatti ca.
ne14:29.4: “Tasma jatassa bhutassa katassa sankhatassa nissaranam pannayati”ti ayam vevacanapannatti nibbanassa, niyyanikapannatti maggassa, nissaranapannatti samsarato.
ne14:29.6: Tenaha ayasma mahakaccayano “ekam bhagava dhammam, pannattihi vividhahi deseti”ti.
